description.name: User can add a valid reference entry to the database

scenario.name: user can add a reference when content is appropriate

then.name: reference entry will be added to the database

scenario.name: user can not add a reference with inadequate information

then.name: reference entry will not be added to the database

scenario.name: user can not add a reference with invalid information

then.name: reference entry will not be added to the database

description.name: User can view a reference entry

scenario.name: user can view a reference entry they have just added

when.name: user attempts to view an entry

then.name: reference entry is displayed to the user

scenario.name: user can not view any references when there are none

given.name: there are no references in the database

when.name: user attempts to view an entry

scenario.name: user will see all the fields of their entry

when.name: user attempts to view an entry

then.name: all fields of the entry are displayed

description.name: User can view a list of references

scenario.name: user can view a list of references

given.name: at least one entry is in the database

when.name: user attempts to view the entry list

then.name: a listing of references is displayed

given.name: at least one entry is in the database

when.name: user attempts to view the entry list

then.name: all the available references are listed
